p: The present study was associated with several limitations. In some severe influenza cases, including cases with viral pneumonia [ 31], the infectious titer in the upper respiratory tract is reported to be low. Thus, negative test results in such cases should probably be confirmed by further testing using RT-PCR or other molecular assays to improve the detection of influenza virus infection [ 18]. In the present study, we only analyzed the performance of ImunoAce Flu in the detection of influenza A virus infection.
